thread.title: BRIEF-Allianz: Allianz Suisse To Buy Das Rechtsschutz (Schweiz)

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Allianz: Allianz Suisse To Buy Das Rechtsschutz (Schweiz)

organizations.name: allianz suisse to buy das rechtsschutz

text:
Jan 10 (Reuters) - Allianz SE:
* ALLIANZ SUISSE TO ACQUIRE DAS RECHTSSCHUTZ (SCHWEIZ), STRENGTHENING ITS POSITION IN THE SWISS MARKET
* AGREES TO BUY LEGAL PROTECTION INSURANCE SUBSIDIARY DAS SWITZERLAND AND ASSETS OF DAS LUXEMBOURG AND SLOVAKIA FROM ERGO GROUP AG‍​
* THE PARTIES HAVE AGREED NOT TO DISCLOSE FINANCIAL DETAILS OF THE TRANSACTION Source text - bit.ly/2mcViQL Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
Our Standards: The Thomson Reuters Trust Principles.
